p: The sample size was calculated by examining other products of rhG-CSF. From reviews of recently developed rhG-CSF products, 12– 14 the intra-subject coefficients of variations (CV w) of AUC inf and C max of filgrastim were 15.6%–20.29% and 13.64%–23.94%, respectively. Based on the data, using the greatest CV w, 23.94%, at a significance level of 0.05 with 80% power, the required sample size was calculated to be 11 subjects/group using a modified Hauschke's equation. 15 Using an assumption of a 20% dropout rate, the required sample size was 28 subjects/dosing part, to give 56 subjects in total.
